title: Revert's name comes from Catholicism (Christian name) Saint Rocco, must he change it assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign comes from a certain figure in Catholicism so my question is is it obligatory upon me to change my name or can I keep it no you can't keep your name without any problem as long as it's not the name of a God or something so lots of people names come from Catholicism or from Judaism and we don't tell them to change their name such as John Luke uh Paul or or uh Mark and the likes so yes you can keep your name without any problem inshallah
